| History                 = The Blue Krüe were a gang recruited by the [[Urban Alliance (Earth-616)|Urban Alliance]] to serve as [[Calvin Zabo (Earth-616)|Mister Hyde]]'s very own private military company.{{r|All-New Ghost Rider Vol 1 6}} They were enhanced by the [[Hyde Formula]] to fight a proxy war against the [[Solntsevskaya Bratva (Earth-616)|Russian Mafia]],{{r|All-New Ghost Rider Vol 1 8}} but ultimately defeated by the combined efforts of Ghost Riders --  [[Roberto Reyes (Earth-616)|Robbie Reyes]] and [[Johnathon Blaze (Earth-616)|Johnny Blaze]].{{r|All-New Ghost Rider Vol 1 10}}
